meanings.definition: A list of terms with their definitions, often found at the end of a book or article.
meanings.sent1: The glossaries at the back of the book helped me understand the new words.
meanings.sent2: I always check the glossaries in textbooks to clarify unfamiliar terms.
meanings.sent3: The glossaries decided to throw a party at the end of the book.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a vast glossaries, filled with definitions waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The colorful glossaries in the book made learning more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: A collection of specialized terms or expressions used in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The medical glossaries contained terms specific to healthcare.
meanings.sent2: In the world of technology, glossaries are essential for understanding jargon.
meanings.sent3: The glossaries of fashion terms decided to start a trend.
meanings.sent4: His vocabulary was a rich glossaries of words from various languages.
meanings.sent5: She studied the glossaries of legal terms to prepare for the case.
